channel.title: Community on Apache Nutch™
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Apache Nutch™

item.title: Mailing Lists
item.description: Ask questions, post your requests, hang out with project committers, or sit back enjoy and watch an extremely vibrant community at work. Users List If you use Nutch, please subscribe to the Nutch user mailing list. The Nutch user mailing list is : user@nutch.apache.org. Subscribe to List Unsubscribe from List Search List Archive Search Old List Archive (nutch@lucene.apache.org) View List Archive Note In order to post to the list, it is necessary to first subscribe to it.

item.title: Merchandise
item.description: See https://www.cafepress.com/nutch for some cool nutch merch! All profits from sales of these products are donated to The Apache Software Foundation. The Apache Nutch logo and mascot were designed and donated to Apache by Thomas Deichsel of Media Style GmbH. The name “Apache Nutch” and depictions of the Apache Nutch logo and mascot are reserved for use by The Apache Software Foundation.

item.title: People & Credits
item.description: The Team A successful project requires many people to play many roles. Put simply... this page is dedicated to those who have helped Nutch along the way. Members The following is a list of project committers who also currently sit on the Nutch Project Management Committee Id Name Email Roles Company mattmann Chris A. Mattmann mattmann[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member NASA JPL markus Markus Jelsma markus[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member Open Index lewismc Lewis John McGibbney lewismc[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member NASA JPL snagel Sebastian Nagel snagel[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member, Project Chair Common Crawl tejasp Tejas Patil tejasp[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member Facebook kiran Kiran Chitturi kiranchitturi[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member LucidWorks feng feng lu feng[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member Patsnap talat Talat Uyarer talat[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member AGMLAB jorgelbg Jorge Luis Betancourt jorgelbg[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member trivago momer Mo Omer momer[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member Mithun totaro Giuseppe Totaro totaro[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member NASA JPL asitang Asitang Mishra asitang[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member NASA JPL sujen Sujen Shah sujen[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member NASA JPL joyce Michael Joyce joyce[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member NASA JPL kamaci Furkan KAMACI kamaci[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member LAGOM omkarr Omkar Reddy omkarr[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member Juniper Networks r0ann3l Roannel Fernandez r0ann3l[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member University of Informatics Sciences balakuntala Shashanka Balakuntala Srinivasa balakuntala[at]apache[dot]org Committer, PMC Member Microsoft Emeritus Committers Doug Cutting Jérôme Charron John Xing Mike Cafarella Piotr Kosiorowski Otis Gospodnetić Andrzej Bialecki Sami Siren Dennis Kubes Dogacan Güney Alexis de Tréglodé Ferdy Galema Julien Nioche Friends Dan Fain (Yahoo!

item.title: SysAdmins/WebMasters
item.description: Introduction If you’re reading this, chances are you’ve seen a Nutch-based robot visiting your site while looking through your server logs. Our software obeys robots.txt files and robot META tags in HTML. These are the standard mechanisms for webmasters to tell web robots which portions of a site a robot is welcome to access. Sysadmins/robots.txt We’re a software project, not a service, so please understand that a misbehaving crawler appearing with our Agent string is not run by us.
